name: Userstyles - Clean v3.0 w/2 & 3 column lists
description:
Revised version of previous style. 

Before SS - Newer image of style in action
After SS - Initial screen of style in use on a style's page

NOTES: 
- URL's posted in style description will display arrow and change to bold
- My account has arrow next to it
- Serif used in a few areas
- Removal of any remaining ads
- Forums excluded from style
- Few definitions applied to style pages only
- Style list shows stars as appropriate to ranking
- Several blocks have rounded edges (firefox only)
- More use of blue colours, not so WHITE..
- Few positioning issues reworked
- EDIT button by users styles is smaller, capitalized and colour changed

Planned: Style to done in dark tones and images to be added, it's basic matt colour at the moment.
